actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to extend its termination date.

summary.text: Extends the authority of the Council on Wage and Price Stability, under the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act, to September 30, 1978. Authorizes the appropriation of $2,210,000 for the purpose of carrying out such Act for fiscal year 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to extend its termination date.
